name: Snake Flow
summary:
Snake Flow is a simple, relaxing puzzle game.   
   
Fill all the empty boxes with the snake to solve each puzzle. But watch out, the time is limited and the difficulty increases.   
   
Snake Flow features:   
   
► The game is endless,Your goal is to beat the high score and collect stars.   
► over 62 unlockable snakes.( the last one is the best one).   
► puzzle builder : you can make your own puzzle to challenge your friends.   
► Unique,clean graphics.   
► Quick control.   
► Relaxing music.
